question: Is there an association between bruxism and reflux
ideal_answer: There is an association between bruxism and reflux.

snippets.text: Rhythmic masticatory muscle activity, including sleep bruxism (SB), can be induced in healthy individuals by experimental esophageal acidification, which plays an important role in the pathogenesis of gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD). However, no robust evidence supports the association between SB and GERD.
Sleep bruxism is prevalent in GERD patients, and GERD is highly associated with SB.
